t: Moorebot Scout Robot Is No Cozmo, Still Fun to Have Around - autoevolution
s: April 3, 2021 - Moorebot calls this thing the “world-first autonomous home robot for intelligent surveillance." It’s 2.8 inches by 4 inches by 4.3 inches in size, and has all sorts of sensors and AI algorithms that allow it to “patrol” your home on pre-set routes. The thing is equipped with a 1080 camera that can stream directly to your smartphone through a dedicated app, and is compatible with Amazon ...
